title: icdConvert - How to Use the Package
text: package can installed github devtools package using following command: might get warning needing Rtools build package, able ignore . can loaded like R package: package contains three primary functions(map_code, get_description, map_describe) dataframe (example_data_icd9_pc). example dataframe character column icd9_pc, list ICD-9 procedure codes.

title: icdConvert - How to Use the Package
text: Suppose following list ICD-9 procedure code: can get ’s description using get_description command. function takes list ICD codes gets code descriptions using CMS provided tables. consistency GEM files, 2018 version tables used ICD-10.

title: icdConvert - How to Use the Package
text: Next, suppose like map list ICD-9 procedure codes ICD-10. can use map_code function, takes vector ICD codes converts desired ICD version. user must specify destination ICD version (.e. ICD version want convert codes ) type code converted ("dg" diagnosis codes, "pc" procedure codes). package handles one--many mappings codes, well implementing four methods mapping codes, outlined touch package. four methods "gem", "reverse-gem", "", "multi-stage". "gem" performs single forward map "reverse-gem" performs single reverse map, case finding ICD-10 codes map ICD-9 code pass. following first 10 results ICD-9 procedure code 0142. "" performs "gem" "reverse-gem" mappings combines results. "multi-stage" performs multi-stage mapping icd_convert function touch package performs. See details mapping done. following first 10 results ICD-9 procedure code 1421. mapping performed using General Equivalence Mapping (GEM) files provided CMS. package uses 2018 version GEMs files last year GEMs files updated (see ): stated FY 2016 IPPS/LTCH PPS final rule (80 FR 49388), GEMs updated annual basis part ICD-10 Coordination Maintenance Committee meetings process continue updated approximately 3 years ICD-10 implemented.
code: map_code_test_gem <- map_code(icd9_pc_codes, icdVer_dest = 10, code_type = "pc", method = "gem") map_code_test_reverse_gem <- map_code("0142", icdVer_dest = 10, code_type = "pc", method = "reverse-gem") map_code_test_multi_stage <- map_code(icd9_pc_codes, icdVer_dest = 10, code_type = "pc", method = "multi-stage")

title: icdConvert - How to Use the Package
text: Finally, map_describe function combines functionality map_code get_description one. maps codes desired ICD version gets corresponding descriptions mapped codes. following first 10 results ICD-9 procedure code 1421.

title: Map Code — map_code
text: Map ICD diagnosis procedure codes either ICD9 ICD10.

title: Map Code — map_code
code: map_code(   codes,   icdVer_dest,   code_type = c("dg", "pc"),   method = c("gem", "reverse-gem", "both", "multi-stage") )

title: Map Code — map_code
text: codes vector ICD diagnosis procedure codes. icdVer_dest number, either 9 10, indicating destination ICD version. code_type string, either "dg" "pc," indicating codes diagnosis procedure, respectively. method string specifying method mapping codes. methods implemented icd_convert function touch package. "gem" performs single forward mapping. "reverse-gem" performs single backward mapping. "" perfroms single forward backward mapping, combining results. "multi-stage" performs multiple-stage mapping, described touch package.

title: Map Code — map_code
text: dataframe source code, matching destination code, additional columns cases multiple codes represent single source code.

title: Map Code and Get Description — map_describe
text: Function maps code gets description mapped codes

title: Map Code and Get Description — map_describe
code: map_describe(   codes,   icdVer_dest,   code_type = c("dg", "pc"),   method = c("gem", "reverse-gem", "both", "multi-stage"),   keepMapCode = FALSE )

title: Map Code and Get Description — map_describe
text: codes vector ICD diagnosis procedure codes. icdVer_dest number, either 9 10, indicating destination ICD version. code_type string, either "dg" "pc," indicating codes diagnosis procedure, respectively. method string, either "gem", "reverse-gem", "", "multi-stage". See documentation map_code details. keepMapCode Boolean - true, returned data frame keep map code associated columns, otherwise dropped.

title: Map Code and Get Description — map_describe
text: dataframe original ICD code, matching code, descriptions , potentially columns map codes.

title: Map Stage — map_stage
text: Performs single stage ICD code mapping, either forward map backward map. forward map takes source codes maps destination codes using GEM, backward map finds codes mapped source codes GEM opposite direction.

title: Map Stage — map_stage
code: map_stage(   codes,   icdVer_dest,   code_type = c("dg", "pc"),   direction = c("forward", "backward") )

title: Map Stage — map_stage
text: codes vector ICD diagnosis procedure codes. icdVer_dest number, either 9 10, indicating destination ICD version. code_type string, either "dg" "pc," indicating codes diagnosis procedure, respectively. direction string, either "forward" "backward", indicate direction mapping.

title: Map Stage — map_stage
text: dataframe source code, matching destination code, additional columns cases multiple codes represent single source code.
